summary: This document contains certified corporate filings from the Delaware Division of Corporations for L.S.J. LLC, including its 1998 Certificate of Formation and a 2019 good standing certificate, provided in response to a 2019 federal subpoena. It shows the company's formation details and legal status as of August 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey W. Bullock
persons.context: Certifies the attached documents for L.S.J. LLC as true and correct copies on file with the Delaware Division of Corporations, and certifies the company's good standing as of August 26, 2019.

persons.name: Russell R. Rosier
persons.context: Signed the Certificate of Formation for L.S.J. LLC on April 17, 1998, as the authorized person executing the document.

events.title: Formation of L.S.J. LLC
events.description: L.S.J. LLC is formed as a limited liability company under Delaware law, with its registered office at the Corporation Trust Center in Wilmington.

events.title: Federal subpoena issued
events.description: A subpoena dated August 9, 2019, signed by an Assistant United States Attorney, requests specified records for L.S.J. LLC.

events.title: Certification of L.S.J. LLC records
events.description: The Delaware Secretary of State certifies the corporate documents for L.S.J. LLC and confirms the company is in good standing with taxes paid to date.

keyFacts: L.S.J. LLC was formed in Delaware on April 17, 1998, with Russell R. Rosier as the authorized person signing its Certificate of Formation.
As of August 26, 2019, L.S.J. LLC was in good standing in Delaware with all annual taxes paid.
The documents were provided in response to a federal subpoena dated August 9, 2019, signed by an Assistant United States Attorney.
The registered agent for L.S.J. LLC is The Corporation Trust Company at the Corporation Trust Center in Wilmington, Delaware.
A custodian of records declaration is included, certifying the business records were made and kept in the regular course of business.
